title: Minutes of Tainan City Government’s 382nd Municipal Administrative Meeting Mayor’s remarks 04/02/2019
content: Mayor’s Remarks:With Tomb Sweeping holiday around the corner, colleagues at the government are expected to implement measures discussed during the last municipal administrative meeting to prevent Dengue fever and fires. The level of traffic control and guidance should follow the standards of the Chinese New Year holiday. And I would like to ask all departments to do your best to ensure good air quality, public safety, smooth traffic, and the quality of tourism experiences in Tainan City during the long weekend. Let us work together to guarantee a safe holiday for our residents.
